extendedInfo.description: myJCC Mobile helps you stay connected to Jefferson Community College from wherever you are. Get access to your courses, grades, Week at a Glance, class schedule, stay informed with the latest campus happenings, find people in the public directory, get in touch instantly, find places on the campus map, get alerts, send messages and more. ----- Main Features: â¨â My Messages: Access all your Messages that have not yet been acknowledged, and customize alert settings.â¨ â Directory: Get in touch with anyone campus-wide, send an email and add that person directly to your phone's address book. â Emergency: Access important numbers and information when you need them. Call to report an emergency or get information from the Jefferson Community College Information Hotline. â Videos: Stay updated with Jefferson Community College youtube videos. â Maps: View campus buildings on the map, see their email address and phone numbers â Events: Keep up with all the happenings on and off campus with events from Jefferson Community College! â Send Messages: Send messages to groups, individuals and communities. â ERP Apps: Jefferson Community College users can now get their ERP related information on this mobile App. â Student Registration: Register for a class or drop from a class on move using this fantastics myJCC Mobile App. â Address Update: View your current address, update them and modify them with a click on go.  â Holds: Check your holds on move. â Create favorites for one click access to preferred apps. Devices Supported - Android Smartphone OS Supported - OS 2.2+

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Its great to register for a class from mobile. Thanks JCC
reviews.author: Vishal Singh

reviews.title: Needs more!
reviews.comment: It\'s okay other than it needs to be upgraded. It would be much better if you were able to access your cannonmail from this app. Little things like that would make the app much better!
reviews.author: Kim Shampine

reviews.title: Need more
reviews.comment: You can\'t really do much with or on it........ needs some major upgrading
reviews.author: Ben Hnry

reviews.title: Thanks my JCC
reviews.comment: This Mobile App is very useful to any student here. Love this App.
reviews.author: Ross Taylor
